flawed_nl_solution:
Susan spent 600/2=<<600/2=300>>300 on clothes
After buying clothes she had 600-300= <<600-300=302>>302 dollars left
She spent 302/2=<<302/2=151>>151 dollars on books
She had 302-151=<<302-151=151>>151 dollars left
#### 151

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 302. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
